name.th: Pump.fun DEX ติดตาม

short.ar: تتبع تفاصيل الرمز وحالة الدفع عبر DEX على Pump.fun مع تحديثات في الوقت الفعلي وردود فعل مرئية.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Track token details and DEX payment status on Pump.fun with real-time updates and visual feedback.
short.cs: Sledujte podrobnosti o tokenech a stav platby DEX na Pump.fun s aktualizacemi v reálném čase a vizuální zpětnou vazbou.
short.de: Verfolgen Sie Token-Details und DEX-Zahlungsstatus auf Pump.fun mit Echtzeit-Updates und visuellen Rückmeldungen.
short.es: Realiza un seguimiento de los detalles de tokens y el estado de pago en DEX en Pump.fun con actualizaciones en tiempo real y…
short.fi: Seuraa tokenin tietoja ja DEX-maksun tilaa Pump.fun:lla reaaliaikaisilla päivityksillä ja visuaalisella palautteella.
short.fr: Suivez les détails des jetons et le statut des paiements DEX sur Pump.fun avec des mises à jour en temps réel et des retours…
short.it: Traccia i dettagli dei token e lo stato dei pagamenti DEX su Pump.fun con aggiornamenti in tempo reale e feedback visivo.
short.ja: Pump.funでトークンの詳細とDEX支払いの状態をリアルタイムで追跡し、視覚的なフィードバックを提供します。
short.ko: Pump.fun에서 토큰 세부 정보 및 DEX 결제 상태를 실시간 업데이트 및 시각적 피드백과 함께 추적하세요.
short.nl: Volg token details en DEX betalingsstatus op Pump.fun met real-time updates en visuele feedback.
short.no: Spor token-detaljer og DEX betalingsstatus på Pump.fun med sanntidsoppdateringer og visuell tilbakemelding.
short.pl: Śledź szczegóły tokena i status płatności DEX na Pump.fun z aktualizacjami w czasie rzeczywistym i wizualnym sprzężeniem zwrotnym.
short.ro: Urmăriți detaliile tokenului și starea plății DEX pe Pump.fun cu actualizări în timp real și feedback vizual.
short.ru: Отслеживайте данные токенов и статус платежей DEX на Pump.fun с обновлениями в режиме реального времени и визуальной обратной…
short.sv: Spåra tokeninformation och DEX-betalningsstatus på Pump.fun med realtidsuppdateringar och visuell feedback.
short.th: ติดตามรายละเอียดโทเค็นและสถานะการชำระเงิน DEX บน Pump.fun พร้อมการอัปเดตแบบเรียลไทม์และข้อเสนอแนะทางสายตา.
short.tr: Pump.fun üzerinde token detaylarını ve DEX ödeme durumunu gerçek zamanlı güncellemeler ve görsel geri bildirimlerle takip edin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pump.fun Token Tracker Chrome Extension
Pump.fun Token Tracker is a Chrome extension designed to quickly and easily track token information on the Pump.fun platform. This extension allows users to view real-time data about specific tokens directly on the Pump.fun website. The main features of the extension are:

DEX Payment Status: Automatically checks whether a token has made payments on decentralized exchanges (DEX) and provides visual feedback to the user.

Token Information Display: Instantly displays important information such as token address, market cap, and token name.

Icon Status: The extension icon changes color based on the token’s status. For example, the icon turns green for tokens that have made DEX payments and red for those that haven’t.

Automatic Tracking: Token data is automatically tracked when navigating specific URLs on Pump.fun, presenting information without the need for user interaction.

Subdomain Support: Optimized to work across the main domain and all subdomains of Pump.fun.
This extension provides an easy and fast solution for users looking to analyze tokens on the Pump.fun platform.
